WIRE_PLANS.name: Wire Basic
WIRE_PLANS.notes: Pay per transfer; standard fees apply.

WIRE_PLANS.name: Wire Plus
WIRE_PLANS.notes: Domestic base fee waived; 50% off international base fee.

WIRE_PLANS.name: Wire Premier
WIRE_PLANS.notes: Waives base fees; cuts correspondent 50%; great for frequent senders.
